hero.headline: Where time tastes like wine
hero.subhead: A historic farmhouse in Piedmont's hills. Six suites with soul, a pool overlooking the valley, and the silence of the woods as your welcome.

intro.title: La Dolce Vita
intro.p1: It's not a theme. It's a way of living.
intro.p2: It's the warm stone beneath your feet in the morning. The scent of the forest drifting through an open window. A glass of Barolo as the sun sinks behind the hills.
intro.p3: At Relais Conac, we cultivate the art of slowness. Every detail — from the wrought-iron lanterns to the wildflowers gathered from the meadow — tells a story of artisan care that has been lost elsewhere.
intro.p4: Here, you don't just "stay." You live, for a few days, as one always should.

suites.title: Our suites

hero.headline: A story that smells of firewood and wine
hero.subhead: Walls that have seen generations. Hands that brought them back to life.

roots.title: The roots
roots.p1: Relais Conac sinks its stones into Piedmont's farming history. Built in the 19th century, it housed families who worked the land, tended vineyards, gathered hazelnuts and truffles.
roots.p2: For decades, these walls kept the slow rhythm of the seasons: harvests, winters by the fireplace, springs among meadow flowers.
roots.p3: Then, as happens to many country houses, silence. Abandonment.

rebirth.title: Bringing it back to light
rebirth.p1: In 2018, [Family name] discovered this farmhouse hidden among the woods. It was a ruin. It was perfect.
rebirth.p2: A restoration began that lasted four years: stone by stone, beam by beam, respecting every crack and imperfection. Local artisans forged the lanterns. Carpenters salvaged the original wood. Nothing was mass-produced.
rebirth.p3: The goal was not to create a hotel. It was to bring a place back to life, and share it.

today.title: What we are
today.p1: Today, Relais Conac is a refuge for those seeking the authentic.
today.p2: Six suites, each with a different soul. A pool with stone edges overlooking the valley. A cellar where Barolo rests. A forest for walking, truffle hunting, getting lost.
today.p3: We are not a resort. We are not just another agriturismo. We are a life project we want to share with those who appreciate things done well, done slowly, done with love.

hero.headline: La Dolce Vita
hero.subhead: It's not nostalgia for a bygone era. It's the choice to live the present with more care.

manifesto.title: Our manifesto
manifesto.intro: La Dolce Vita is not a film. Not a vintage poster. Not a postcard cliché.
manifesto.intro2: It's the way we choose to do things here.

time.title: It's the time we dedicate.
time.text: To morning coffee, sipped while watching the mist rise from the valley. To dinner prepared with ingredients gathered today. To conversation that stretches beyond dessert.

details.title: It's the attention to details.
details.text: To the lanterns lit every evening at dusk. To fresh flowers in every room. To the bottle of local wine waiting in your room.

pleasure.title: It's pleasure that needs no justification.
pleasure.text: An afternoon by the pool with no agenda. A walk through the woods with no destination. A second glass of Barolo, just because.

authenticity.title: It's authenticity that doesn't perform.
authenticity.text: Real stones, not reconstructed. Furniture found in markets, not catalogs. Local stories, not marketing.

manifesto.conclusion: At Relais Conac, La Dolce Vita is not a slogan. It's what you'll see, feel, and taste every day.

senses.title: The five senses of the farmhouse

sight.name: Sight
sight.text: The soft line of the hills. The golden light of sunset on stone. The lanterns lighting up one by one.

sound.name: Sound
sound.text: Silence, broken only by birds. The crackle of fire. Footsteps on the gravel path.

smell.name: Smell
smell.text: The forest after rain. The scent of freshly found truffle. Wood burning in the fireplace.

taste.name: Taste
taste.text: A Barolo that tells the story of its vineyard. The neighbor's honey. Warm morning bread.

touch.name: Touch
touch.text: Sun-warmed stone. Fresh bed linens. Pool water on skin.

hero.headline: Six rooms, six souls
hero.subhead: Each suite carries the name of an element from the Piedmontese landscape. Each has a story to tell.

suites.intro: Choose yours. Or let us guide you: we'll lead you to the soul that suits you.

amenities.kettle: Kettle with tea and coffee selection

bruma.name: Bruma
bruma.tagline: The mist that caresses the hills at dawn
bruma.description: Bruma is the name we give to the light mist that, on autumn mornings, wraps the valley like a silk veil. This suite captures its essence. Pearl-grey tones blend with the warm cream of natural fabrics. Light enters softly, filtered through linen curtains. From the bed, the view opens onto the valley — often veiled, indeed, by the morning mist. It's the suite for those seeking intimacy and contemplation. For those who love slow awakenings, coffee in bed, silence.
bruma.highlight: Panoramic window with seating to contemplate sunrise

vendemmia.name: Vendemmia
vendemmia.tagline: The scent of ripe grapes and the warmth of the earth
vendemmia.description: Vendemmia tells the story of the most anticipated season in Langhe: when the vines turn gold and red, and the air fills with the scent of ripe grapes. In this suite, warm woods and deep reds evoke the cellar, tradition, the patient work of winemakers. It's the suite for those seeking warmth and character.
vendemmia.highlight: Antique salvaged wood details and burgundy tones

lanterna.name: Lanterna
lanterna.tagline: The golden light that guides you home
lanterna.description: Every evening, at dusk, we light the lanterns along the pathway. Lanterna captures that golden light, that suspended moment between day and night. It's the brightest suite, with wrought-iron touches and amber reflections. For those seeking romance and that sense of coming home.
lanterna.highlight: Original wrought-iron lanterns and private balcony

tartufo.name: Tartufo
tartufo.tagline: The hidden treasure of the forest floor
tartufo.description: Truffle is not cultivated, it is searched for. Born in the shade of the forest, underground, precious precisely because it's rare. This suite evokes that mystery: earthy tones, natural textures, a gathered and authentic atmosphere. For those who love rare things and unexpected discoveries.
tartufo.highlight: Natural materials and direct connection to the garden

vigna.name: Vigna
vigna.description: The vineyard rows are a landscape of the soul: order within nature, patience becoming beauty. Green, cream, and golden touches create an airy and serene suite that looks directly onto the vineyards. For those seeking peace and breath.
vigna.highlight: Direct vineyard view and particularly luminous spaces

camino.name: Camino
camino.tagline: The crackle of firewood, the warmth that embraces
camino.description: On winter evenings, there's nothing like fire. Camino is the most intimate suite: exposed stone, warm light, a real working fireplace. It's the perfect refuge when it's cold outside and comfortable inside. For those seeking the most authentic warmth.
camino.highlight: Working fireplace and original stone walls

wedding.title: Intimate weddings
wedding.p1: Not just any wedding. Your wedding.
wedding.p2: Relais Conac hosts ceremonies and receptions for small numbers — up to 50 guests — in an atmosphere you won't find elsewhere.
wedding.p3: The ceremony in the meadow overlooking the hills. Aperitivo by the pool as the sun sets. Dinner in the inner courtyard, among lanterns and candles. The celebration continuing by the fireplace.
wedding.p4: Every detail is crafted with you: from the menu to floral arrangements, from music to lighting.

highlights.stay: Overnight stay for the couple and guests

party.title: Private parties
party.p1: Special birthdays. Anniversaries. Family reunions. Every occasion becomes memorable when the setting is right.
party.p2: Rent the entire farmhouse for a weekend with friends or family. We organize themed dinners, tastings, personalized experiences.

aperitivo.title: Sunset aperitivo
aperitivo.p1: The sun sinking behind the hills. Glasses of Langhe DOC. Small bites prepared with local ingredients. Soft music, lanterns lighting up.
aperitivo.p2: The perfect aperitivo exists. It's here.

dinner.title: Romantic dinners
dinner.p1: A table for two in the most beautiful spot on the property — whether the terrace with a view, the poolside, or by the winter fireplace.
dinner.p2: Tasting menu with paired wines. No other guests. Just you.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: What are check-in and check-out times?
faq.a1: Check-in from 3:00 PM, check-out by 11:00 AM. Flexible times on request.
faq.a2: Yes, on request and for select suites. Contact us for details.
faq.a3: The pool is open from May to September. Heated from June to August.
faq.q4: Is it possible to organize private events?
faq.a4: Yes, we host intimate weddings, private parties, and exclusive dinners. Visit our Events page.
faq.a5: On weekends and during high season, we require a minimum of 2 nights.

hero.headline: Living Piedmont
hero.subhead: This land is not visited. It's smelled, tasted, walked. These are the experiences waiting for you.

truffle.title: Truffle hunting
truffle.p1: At dawn, when the forest is still damp with dew, we set out with our truffle hunter and his dog.
truffle.p2: We walk among oaks and hazelnuts, in silence, waiting for the moment when the dog stops and starts digging. And then, there it is: white or black truffle, hidden treasure of Piedmontese earth.
truffle.p3: On return, a tasting with fried eggs and tajarin with truffle.
truffle.includes: Includes: walk, tasting, glass of wine

wine.title: Private tastings
wine.p1: Barolo, Barbaresco, Nebbiolo, Arneis. The wines of these hills tell the story of the land they come from.
wine.p2: We organize tastings in our cellar or poolside at sunset, guided by local producers who will reveal the secrets of their vineyards.
wine.p3: Not a lecture, but a conversation. Not a sampling, but a journey.
wine.pairing: Paired with local cheeses and cured meats
wine.visits: Possibility of visits to nearby wineries

nature.title: Nature walks
nature.p1: Trails start directly from the farmhouse.
nature.p2: You can walk for hours through vineyards, hazelnut groves, and woods, encountering only silence and the occasional deer. Morning mists, golden sunsets, the scent of earth after rain.
nature.p3: On request, we organize guided hikes with local experts.

pool.title: Pool & stillness
pool.p1: The edges are local stone. The water reflects Langhe's sky. Around, only green and silence.
pool.p2: The farmhouse pool is not an attraction. It's a place to do nothing, in the fullest and most precious sense of the word.
pool.p3: Sun loungers, towels, a carafe of infused water. The rest is brought by the time you've decided to give yourself.
